hadith.chapterTitle: Excellence of Meeting with a Smiling Countenance and Politeness in Speech
hadith.body:
'Adi bin Hatim (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "Guard yourselves against the Fire (of Hell) even if it be only with half a date-fruit (given in charity); and if you cannot afford even that, you should at least say a good word."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب استحباب طيبب الكلام وطلاقته الوجه عند اللقاء
hadith.body: - عن عدي بن حاتم رضي الله عنه قال‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏اتقوا النار ولو بشق تمرة فمن لم يجد فبكلمة طيبة‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏ ‏.‏
